More than once while playing the “Source” version of “Half-Life”, I found myself wondering whether or not it was actually better than the original “GoldSrc” version. I mean, it so clearly is, and then again, it isn’t really. The updated graphics look objectively better of course (especially in the outdoor levels) and the Havok physics engine adds a little more realism, but at the end of the day, the “Half-Life” experience is more than just the game’s engine and the character of the game doesn’t really change, whether you play the 2004 or the 1998 version. If anything, the “Source” version is a faithful port of the original and may provide a more palatable entry for some first time players. If you don’t mind an even “purer” classic game experience, however, there is absolutely nothing wrong in going with the original version.
Its free to play alongside the rest of the series until Alyx comes out. Now is the time.

For the unaware: Half-Life Source is a mediocre port of Half-Life 1 to the HL2 engine. It was so mediocre and disappointing that a group of fed-up fans said "we'll port Half-Life 1 to the Source engine properly ourselves if Valve won't do it", and this is why Black Mesa exists.

If you're gonna play Half-Life 1, don't play this version. It sucks.

I am writing this review for both HL1 versions.
That's the classic game and the source one.
Both versions deserve a huge positive review.
The source version much better to be honest.
But that original version deserves praise too.
This half-life was just evolutionary back then.
I loved the story and the gameplay was nice.
These games aged very nicely, it's fantastic.
Even after all those years, they are still gud.
But I do recommend playing the source one.
It is a ton more polished experience overall.
This is a piece of gaming history right here.
Even the music and atmosphere feels nice.

[h1]Half-Life: Source é um jogo clássico de ação desenvolvido pela Valve[/h1]

O jogo que é um relançamento na engine Source, novamente na campanha te coloca no papel de Gordon Freeman, que após um experimento que deu errado, coloca o protagonista contra uma raça alienígena hostil.

A história então é a mesma do anterior, com apenas mudanças gráficas e algumas pequenas coisas melhoradas graças a engine Source, sem multiplayer e ainda infelizmente nessa versão surgiu novos bugs e alguns bem ruins.

A minha experiência de bugs com o jogo foi a seguinte: 
De inicio eu achei que ia ser de boa os bugs, já tava sabendo que essa versão tinha muitos, então após iniciar o jogo eu notei que os guardas e os cientistas ficam gritando e gemendo infinitamente, o que foi bem engraçado, depois foi uma ocasião que meu jogo resolveu salvar automaticamente no mesmo segundo que eu iria morrer e ficar repetindo o load game nesse mesmo exato segundo, mas o pior de todos foi o que eu tive no capítulo 5 do "TEMOS ELEMENTOS HOSTIS" que por conta de um elevador não funcionar por aparentemente eu ter acidentalmente seguido o caminho errado e dado o retorno, me impossibilitando de usar os elevador pra voltar ao caminho que eu estava originalmente, o pior de tudo foi que eu fiquei quase por 1 hora e meia tentando descobrir que diabos tava acontecendo, pois eu consegui fazer a mesma burrada 2x seguidas, pois apesar de eu ter reiniciado a fase completamente, na segunda tentativa eu aparentemente fiz acontecer o mesmo bug e fiquei preso na fase novamente, até descobrir o que tinha dado de errado, foi algo bem estressante porque eu num sabia o que fazer e isso não nunca tinha acontecido comigo no jogo original psoksspssopsks.

[b]Vale a pena comprar?[/b]
Olha o jogo é bom, se você tiver gostado da história e jogabilidade do Half-Life original, você também vai gostar desse, mas o que ferra é os bugs, especialmente o que eu citei do elevador, pode ser que não vá acontecer com você  e acabe que só tenha que aturar esses bugs mais inofensivos, mas sinceramente não sei se algum dia eu jogaria de novo esse por conta desse bug terrível, quase que estragou minha experiência de jogo, então eu recomendo você comprar se realmente tiver afim de jogar ou completar a coleção e que esteja bem ciente dos problemas que esse jogo tem.

Half-life 1 na Source engine, Não vale a pena pois tem muitos bugs, Recomendo a versão original.
Spiel ist nicht spielbar, da der Sicherheitsbeamte die zweite Tür nicht öffnet. Dies ist ein bekanntes Problem.

El juego es una buena remasterización del original, pero el motor Source hubiera sido mejor aplicado (Tal como fue aplicado en Portal) si no hubiera sido un casi Copy-Paste del original. Sin embargo, también me parece una experiencia audiovisual increíble.
It's not nearly as good as the original, but it's a must play for any hardcore Half Life fans.

This game is the legendary game Half-Life, ported into the Source engine.
This port contains various bugs which did not exist back in the original game, although I can not say that these bugs were game-breaking.
In all honesty, I can not recommend the original Half-Life over Half-Life: Source or vice versa, it boils down to personal preference. If you have played neither though, I highly encourage you to play either of them or both.

С Нихуялтом воопще всё херово. Как только убиваю-игра крашается. В общем игру не советую покупать. Купите обычную Half-Life и не допускайте этих ошибок.

Half-Life: Source это та же самая Half-Life но перенесён движок с старого GoldScr на Sourse(движок Half-Life 2). Игра не изменилась и графика то же. По поводу багов, вертолёт не имеет хитбоксов(с тау пушки и РПГ не возможно уничтожить так как снаряды пролетают мимо), тентакли не наносят урон и работаю только через раз, смесь которую плюёт гонарч на поверхность не имеет текстуры и просто чёрный квадрат. Всё же мне понравилось на Sourse но лучше не покупать игру за 259 рублей и дождаться скидок когда она будет стоит 25 рублей. Либо лучше купить Black Mesa там и графика по лучше и места изменили, добавили новые детали. Вообщем Half-Life: Source я ставлю оценку 5/10 так как имеются баги которые не дают спокойно поиграть в игру а так спасибо за новый движок(точнее старый но довольно хорош в физике тех годов когда его создали)

I know, I know - 84 hours in Half-Life: Source? How? 

Spawning massive amounts of enemies, turning on notarget, and watching Black Mesa descend into ragdoll hell never gets old. I've done runs of this game only using the crossbow to pin people to the walls, runs where I just spawn HECU troops or vortigaunts to take care of enemies for me... it's always fun. Source has its problems, but I enjoy it a hell of a lot.

Coz tu duzo mowic, pierwszy Half-Life na silniku Source. Czy to dobrze? Nie wiem, poniewaz nie przeszedlem podstawowej wersji gry, jestem swiezutkim fanem tej serii i nie zdazylem poprzechodzic wszystkich czesci po 4 razy. Ale do rzeczy. Ta czesc od podstawowej jest o tyle lepsza, ze do tej mozna sciagnac spolszczenie z tego wzgledu, ze podstawowa wersja nie obsluguje napisow, a ta na Source juz tak. I to w zasadzie jedyny plus, bo ja doswiadczylem 2 minusow. Pierwszym z nich bylo to, ze nie widzialem modelu broni. Cos sie najwidoczniej z viewmodelem spierdolilo, ale z tym dalo sie jeszcze grac, gorzej z tym drugim minusem. Nim z kolei byly crashe po kazdej probie uzycia Tau Cannon. Nie wiem, czym to bylo spowodowane. Po prostu musialem grac bez uzywania tej broni, co tez bylo mozliwe, ale wystarczylo, ze przez przypadek wzialem do reki te bron i nacisnalem lewy przycisk myszy- won do pulpitu. Nie bylo to az takie straszne w sumie, bo czesto zapisywalem gre, ale orientowanie sie jaka bron ma sie w reku tylko i wylacznie po wygladzie celownika nie jest takie wygodne. 

 Podsumowujac, ta czesc mozna przejsc na samym poczatku przygody z seria Half-Life, jak w moim przypadku, by jak najlepiej zapoznac sie z fabula, jesli u kogos z angielskim kiepsko, aczkolwiek gra bedzie nieco utrudniona. Polecam, no ale takie naciagane 6/10.

It is a purely great remake of half life 1. running on the source engine it is much more powerful and can do something really cool. run on garry's mod (https://store.steampowered.com/app/4000/Garrys_Mod/). it now has a level select for those of you tired of typing "map d2_endgame". consider getting it after watching a few walkthroughs.
